lender.name: jessica

lender.name: Michael

lender.name: Daria

lender.occupational_info: With my husband, I take care of my two children, my home and help at the local schools. I grow a garden each year with vegetables and flowers. I love animals, especially our dog.

lender.name: Sarah

lender.name: Arianne
lender.loan_because: I can.

lender.name: Lisa Marie
lender.loan_because: God has blessed me richly, with a loving family, a good education, a job that allows me to save a little, and a sense of great opportunity. I give in thanks, and with the hope that it helps someone feel loved, wanted, supported and empowered.
lender.occupational_info: I have worked in the microfinance field since early 2004, both with advocacy, education, research and communications. Earlier I have worked in the youth employment field and at a media for development organization.

lender.name: Preston
lender.loan_because: I want to be an international economic developer and I want to live what I will one day be preaching.

lender.name: John
lender.loan_because: It not only does good in other countries, but it feels good to be generous. Also, it gives back, so you can lend to more people!
lender.occupational_info: I am studying and working hard to get to a school that will give me a degree in business and technology. I hope to get a patent on some of my inventions and create a business out of it.

lender.name: Barb
lender.loan_because: I can walk only if others can stand on their own feet, I can sing only if others can raise their voices, too.

lender.name: Suzanne

lender.occupational_info: I work with school children ages 11-14. I try to teach them skills to be successful in school and life.

lender.name: Ron
lender.loan_because: Because the future of our world's diverse cultures depends on local communities regaining control of their livelihood. An amount of money I will soon forget I spent can become a catalyst for something truly worthwhile.
lender.occupational_info: I work as a physical therapist and medical Spanish interpreter in a small hospital in Northern California. I have worked on medical missions in Guatemala, and am learning to help with rainwater catchment to improve the water quality for the people in that area.

lender.name: Michael

lender.name: Kelly
lender.loan_because: I admire the creativity and determination of the people that are recieving these loans. These are really amazing people so it is really very thrilling to get to be a part of what they are doing.

lender.loan_because: If this is a break that people need, that makes me feel good to be able to help someone towards a good future where ever they may be in the world. Everyone deserves a chance.

lender.loan_because: I believe together we can change the world.
lender.occupational_info: I have worked for Nepalese Red Cross for 5 years and know the real suffering of poor people. Lets try our best to give a helping hand to someone who is on real need.

lender.loan_because: Those who have the courage to become entrepreneurs and set ambitious goals deserve our support!

lender.loan_because: I heard about this website on cbc radio and have been reading profiles of people who need small loans. I want to help others suceed in their businesses.

lender.name: GAP Family Group
lender.loan_because: Matthew 25:14-30

lender.name: Cupido
lender.loan_because: In South Africa , our rainbow nation is fading, due to aids, crime, unemployment and now currently the global financial crisis, its seems their is no more hope. Through my project, Phila Promotions I want to give those youths, communities, through,music, singing and dancing, back, through poetry that will still the inner spirit and songs that will, comfort the soul.
lender.occupational_info: Nothing gives me more pride, when a hungry child, smiles, a jobless man, in his first job, and a sick child receiving help. This is me. Promoting and helping those who cannot help them selfs.

lender.name: Stephen
lender.loan_because: i think people in poor countries should have a life like us

lender.name: Jason
lender.loan_because: It is a bargain to be able to help people with no resources change their lives for only $25. Dollar for dollar it doesn't get better than that. For what Atlanta moving companies charge for a single move 5-25 people could be helped to start their own businesses.
lender.occupational_info: I do sales for Atlanta moving companies.

lender.name: Brent Franson
lender.occupational_info: Brent Franson is a recognized search engine-marketing authority with a proven track record of creating powerful online search marketing strategies. Before coming to ReputationDefender, he founded and built a successful global full-service search engine-marketing firm, with offices in Mountain View, Denver, Philadelphia, and Bangalore, India. In his current role as Senior Director of ReputationDefender's MyEdge Client Solutions, he uses his decade of experience in search marketing strategy and deep search algorithm expertise to manage and maintain our clients' online reputations.

lender.name: HOS Book Club
lender.loan_because: Our book club read Banker to the Poor by Yunis and wanted to be a small part of changing someone's life by helping them help themselves through their hard work.

lender.name: Michael
lender.loan_because: By an accident of birth I have more money than most people in the world, and I want to put it to good use.
lender.occupational_info: I try to understand how the world works, and I get paid for it! Lucky again.

lender.name: Dave Roberts
lender.loan_because: I enjoy helping others start on the path to entrepreneurship.
lender.occupational_info:
I help small businesses promote their businesses over the Web. An engagement for me usually starts with a client who is not happy with the results that a Web site is delivering.
As you can see, I also enjoy skiing! Photography, wines, cycling, cooking are other interests. So many hobbies, so little time....
